properties.title: Ant Plugin for Vulcan Build Manager

section.name: Overview
section.p: This plugin provides support for Apache Ant.
The plugin is part of the main Vulcan distribution.
To use this plugin, you need to have a complete, working installation of Ant, which can be obtained from http://ant.apache.org.
